title: Darkover Landfall
description: Here is the tale of the arrival of humans on the mysterious, uncharted world of Darkover, the story of what happened when a Terran colony ship crashlanded on Darkover, and colonists and crew were divided between those who sought to repair the starship and escape this unknown world and those who wished to stay and build an Earth colony, little realizing the dangers they would face and the future possibilities that awaited them until the Ghost Wind began to blow and the powers of Darkover woke to claim them completely.
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley
